elements.name: AppearanceType
elements.title: What type of court appearance do you need scheduled?
elements.description: Usually, you will be asking to schedule another of the same appearance you last had unless the judge ordered or directed a different type of appearance. The type of appearance should be on the scheduling notice you received. If you are not sure what should be scheduled, ask the court registry staff.
elements.otherText: Other court appearance as ordered or directed by the court (please specify):
